baseRuleHeader.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 19

baseRule.text: 若比丘尼先乞是。既得不用更乞餘物。尼薩耆波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 19

partialParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṁ viññāpetvā aññaṁ viññāpeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
partialParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya pācittiya 4

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber, nachdem sie um eines gebeten hat, um etwas anderes bittet, muß es aushändigen und dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni, having had one thing asked for, (then send it back and) have another thing asked for, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang, setelah memiliki satu hal yang di minta, (kemudian mengirimnya kembali dan) meminta hal lain, itu harus di sita dan di akui.

partialParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，欲索是，更索彼者，尼薩耆波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 19

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼乞是已。更索餘者。尼薩耆波夜提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 25

partialParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼買諸藥物繫竟復解。解而復繫者。泥薩祇波逸底迦。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 31

partialParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṁ cetāpetvā aññaṁ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
partialParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya pācittiya 5

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber, nachdem sie das eine im Tausch erhalten hat, etwas anderes im Tausch erhalten möchte, muß es aushändigen und dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni, having had one thing bought, (then send it back and) have another thing bought, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang, setelah memiliki satu hal yang di belikan, (kemudian mengirimnya kembali dan) meminta untuk di belikan hal lain, itu harus di sita dan di akui.
